fields.name: statusReason
fields.description: A code indicating why the administration was not performed.

binding.description: A code indicating why the administration was not performed.

fields.name: medicationCodeableConcept
fields.description: A code that defines the medication that was administered.

binding.description: A code that defines the medication that was administered.

fields.name: performer
fields.description: Indicates who or what performed the medication administration and how they were involved.

fields.name: performer.function
fields.description: Distinguishes the type of involvement of the performer in the medication administration.

binding.description: Distinguishes the type of involvement of the performer in the medication administration.

fields.name: dosage
fields.description: Indicates how the medication is to be used by the patient.

fields.name: dosage.site
fields.description: A coded specification of the anatomic site where the medication first entered the body.

binding.description: A coded specification of the anatomic site where the medication first entered the body.

fields.name: dosage.route
fields.description: Route or physiological path of administration of a therapeutic agent into or onto the body of a subject.

binding.description: Route or physiological path of administration of a therapeutic agent into or onto the body of a subject.
